name: Lightest DuckDuckGo Lite!
description:
Hi, if you're using duckduckgo and you don't think it loads quick enough for your Google
tastebuds, then check out DDG Lite! with no Javascript and little... everything!

Use this as your search engine url : https://duckduckgo.com/lite/?q=%s

This theme is extremely early on and basic. Needs more work, IMO. Hopefully someone enjoys it!
